key_insights.amazon_theme: Amazon news focused on AI innovations (Business Assistant, Bedrock), strong earnings performance, and strategic partnerships. Overall positive sentiment with multiple catalysts supporting upward price movement.
key_insights.tesla_theme: Tesla facing significant headwinds with 23% sales decline post-tax credit elimination, but stock showing resilience. Morgan Stanley highlighting forward catalysts (xAI, FSD, chips) while market appears to be looking past near-term delivery weakness.
key_insights.market_context: Divergent narratives: Amazon benefiting from AI momentum and operational strength, while Tesla navigating demand challenges but maintaining investor confidence through strategic optionality beyond automotive.
key_insights.threshold_analysis: 13 of 20 news items (65%) exceeded MIN_RELEVANCE_SCORE of 70, indicating moderately high quality news feed with direct material impact on covered securities. 7 items below threshold were primarily tangential references, mistagged symbols, or generic market commentary.
